RespTxt: Obama was not born in the US
QuestionTxt: As you may know, some people have suggested that President (Barack) Obama was not born in the United States.  Do you think Obama was not born in the US, Obama was born in the US, or it is not clear whether Obama was born in the US or not?
SurveyOrg: Program On International Policy Attitudes, University of Maryland
StudyNote: The poll was fielded by Knowledge Networks using its national panel which is randomly selected from the entire national population and subsequently provided Internet access, if needed.
